daily_goals.goal: Prioritize Hydration: Aim to drink at least 8 glasses of water a day. Staying hydrated supports overall health, boosts energy, and improves digestion.
Get Active Daily: Set a goal to engage in at least 30 minutes of physical activity each day. This can be walking, yoga, cycling, or any exercise that you enjoy.
Eat More Whole Foods: Focus on incorporating more fruits, vegetables, whole grains, and lean proteins into your meals. Aim for a colorful plate that provides diverse nutrients.

reflections.2025-01-19: Well Done today! I successfully completed all my daily goals and maintained my habits. Keep up the great work!
